Honoo no Alpenrose: Sweet Memory Ongaku-: A music-video style recap OVA. This release covers episode 1-11. Some music used is full song versions with accompanied singing, other sections of the recap are entirely classical Austrian music.
['Honoo no Alpenrose: Judy & Randy', 'Honoo no Alpenrose', 'Honoo no Alpenrose: Ai no Symphony Ongaku-hen']
